pt.piloto: {{origin_service}} {{origin_city}}, bom dia, {{callsign}}, na posição {{gate}}, solicita plano de voo instrumentos para {{destination_city}} no nível {{cruise}}, ciente da informação {{atis}}, pronto para cópia.
pt.atc: {{callsign}}, autorizado IFR para {{destination_city}} no nível {{cruise}}, decola da pista {{runway}}, transição via {{sid}}, código transponder {{transponder}}, coteje.

pt.piloto: Autorizado IFR para {{destination_city}}, nível {{cruise}}, decola da {{runway}}, transição {{sid}}, código transponder {{transponder}}, {{callsign}}.
pt.atc: {{callsign}}, cotejamento correto. Para pushback e acionamento, coordene com a UNICOM 122.800. Bom voo!

en.piloto: {{origin_service}} {{origin_city}} Delivery, good morning, {{callsign}}, at stand {{gate}}, requesting IFR clearance to {{destination_city}}, FL{{cruise}}, with {{atis}}, ready to copy.
en.atc: {{callsign}}, cleared to {{destination_city}}, climb FL{{cruise}}, departure runway {{runway}}, via SID {{sid}}, squawk {{transponder}}. Read back.

en.piloto: Cleared to {{destination_city}}, FL{{cruise}}, via SID {{sid}}, runway {{runway}}, squawk {{transponder}}, {{callsign}}.
en.atc: {{callsign}}, readback correct. Contact UNICOM 122.800 for pushback and startup. Have a good flight!

pt.atc: {{callsign}}, autorizado pushback e acionamento, reporte pronto para taxi.

en.atc: {{callsign}}, pushback and start-up approved. Report ready for taxi.

pt.atc: {{callsign}}, taxi via {{taxi_out}} até o ponto de espera da {{runway}}.

en.atc: {{callsign}}, taxi via {{taxi_out}} to holding point runway {{runway}}.

pt.piloto: {{callsign}}, pronto no ponto de espera da {{runway}}.
pt.atc: {{callsign}}, autorizado decolagem pista {{runway}}, vento calmo, ajuste {{qnh}}.

en.atc: {{callsign}}, cleared for takeoff runway {{runway}}, wind calm, {{qnh}}.

pt.piloto: {{callsign}}, decolado, subindo para FL190 via SID {{sid}}.
pt.atc: {{callsign}}, radar contato, reporte ao atingir FL190.
Autorizado subida para {{cruise}}, reporte no ideal de descida.

en.piloto: {{callsign}}, airborne, climbing to FL190 via SID {{sid}}.

en.atc: Climb and maintain {{cruise}}, report at top of descent.

pt.atc: {{callsign}}, boa tarde, continue descida para FL070.

en.atc: {{callsign}}, good afternoon, descend and maintain FL070.
Cleared for {{procedimento}} approach runway  {{runway_d}}, report established.

pt.piloto: {{callsign}}, na final da  {{runway_d}}, trem baixado e travado.
pt.atc: Autorizado pouso pista {{runway_d}}, ajuste {{qnh}}, reporte livrando.

en.piloto: {{callsign}}, final runway {{runway_d}}, gear down and locked.
en.atc: Cleared to land runway {{runway_d}}, {{qnh}}, report runway vacated.

pt.atc: {{callsign}}, prossiga o taxi via {{taxi_in}} posição {{gate_d}}, mantenha na escuta da TWR até o corte dos motores.
pt.piloto: Vai prosseguir com o taxi via {{taxi_in}} posição {{gate_d}}, vai manter na escuta da torre até o corte dos motores o {{callsign}}.
{{callsign}}, informa corte dos motores na posição {{gate_d}}.
pt.atc: Ciente {{callsign}}, coordene agora na frequência livre 122.800. Até a próxima!

en.atc: {{callsign}}, taxi to stand {{taxi_in}}{{gate}}, remain with tower until engine shutdown.
en.piloto: Taxiing to stand {{taxi_in}}{{gate_d}}, staying with tower until shutdown, {{callsign}}.

en.atc: Contact UNICOM 122.800. See you next time!
